name: Chained Souls
description:
Chained Souls

Chained Souls is a twin-stick action arena in which the player controls two characters at the same time. The protagonists happen to be bonded together by a magic chain. This ethereal connection makes it possible to consume any life source it touches. 

The couple will try to defend the vulnerable townfolks from the cruel invaders.

Feature

Twin Stick Difficult controls at first but when mastered will take the players into
making cool manoeuvres to kill his enemies.
Strategy Players will have to come up with clever moves to properly defeat every
different enemy that will come into their path.
The link as the only weapon The characters dispone of their bond alone to defend
during the waves of foes.
Fantasy flavour Battles set in a commercial square of a medieval fantasy village,
with beautiful 3D models and spicy animations.
